name: Seven Layer Salad
author: Leah Mae
summary: I usually make this bacon, lettuce, onion, pea, cheese and cauliflower layered salad in a large flat bowl. There's never too much because everybody loves it!  You can vary the salad by substituting green onions for red, jack cheese for the Cheddar, etc.
ingredients: 1 large head iceberg lettuce - rinsed, dried, and chopped
1 (10 ounce) package frozen green peas, thawed
directions: Place bacon in a large, deep skillet
Cook over medium high heat until evenly brown
In a large flat bowl, place the chopped lettuce and top with a layer of onion, peas, shredded cheese, cauliflower and bacon
Prepare the dressing by whisking together the mayonnaise, sugar and Parmesan cheese
Drizzle over salad and refrigerate until chilled
